data.text: Dogu God, dogu God, Goe gu diiagi au beleiaha?
Meenei dogu God, au gu gahigahi Goe i di aa, gei Goe hagalee helekai mai.
Malaa, Goe dela go di God hagamadagudia
Madau damana ala namua nogo hagadagadagagee adu gi di Goe,
Digaula nogo gahigahi Goe, gei digaula guu too gi daha mo di haingadaa.
Gei au gu hagalee tangada, au e hai be di mee maaloo
Digau huogodoo ala ma ga mmada mai gi di au
mo di helekai, “Goe gu hagadagadagagee gi Dimaadua,
Ma Kooe hua dela nogo benebene au i dogu madagoaa ne haanau ai,
Au nogo hagadagadagagee adu gi di Goe mai i dogu madagoaa ne haanau ai,
Goe hudee haga mogowaa ina Goe gi daha mo au!
Nia hagadaumee e dogologowaahee e haganiga au gadoo be nia kau daane,
Digaula e hanga nadau ngudu be nia laion,
Au gu deai ogu mahi ai, ogu mahi gu hagalee
Dogu akii gu maangoo gadoo be nia gohu dogolia.
Di buini gau huaidu e haganiga mai i dogu gili
Ogu iwi huogodoo gu kila mai haga modongoohia.
Digaula e bilei gi ogu gahu, mo di duwwe nia maa i ginaadou.22.18 Matthew 27.35; Mark 15.24; Luke 23.34; John 19.24
Meenei Dimaadua, Goe hudee haga mogowaa ina Goe gi daha mo au!
Haga dagaloaha ina au gi daha mo tulumanu dauwa.
Daawa au gi daha mo nia laion aanei.
Au ga hagi anga do ingoo gi ogu duaahina.
ga helekai boloo, “Goodou go nia daane hai hegau a Dimaadua,
Mee hagalee diiagi digau hagaloale,
Au ga hagaamu Goe i lodo nia hagabuulinga llauehe.
Digau hagaloale gaa gai nadau hagabae mee ala e hiihai ginai.
Nia henua huogodoo ga langahia a Dimaadua.
Dimaadua la di king, go Mee e dagi nia henua.
Nia daangada hagamuamua huogodoo gaa pala gi Mee.
Nia adu daangada huogodoo ala ga lloo aga dagidilaangi ga hai hegau gi Mee.
Nia daangada ala digi haanau ga hagalongo boloo,
